Articles.Content: I Finally landed near this arch I found forever ago and wanted to know if it was new or old news.

To answer your question - it\'s old news, but still thankfully a surprise to most KSP players who don\'t expect it as a new easter egg

Please use the previous topic for now: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12715.15

As a forum tip, always check with the Forum Search feature to see if something you encounter has been previously posted
